meta.title: About Us | EmlakBanq
meta.description: Meet EmlakBanq - 100+ experts, two offices, Dubai's trusted luxury real estate advisors.

about.heading: About EmlakBanq
about.subtitle: Dubai's trusted partner for luxury real estate investment

story.label: Our Story
story.title: Our Story
story.p1: EmlakBanq was founded with a singular vision: to redefine the luxury real estate experience in Dubai. What started as a boutique advisory firm has grown into a global platform with over 100 expert advisors operating across two continents.
story.p2: We believe that buying property in Dubai should be as exciting as the city itself — transparent, seamless, and rewarding. Our team combines deep market knowledge with a genuine passion for helping investors find their perfect match.
story.p3: From off-plan opportunities to ready-to-move villas, from Golden Visa assistance to after-sales property management, we are your end-to-end partner in Dubai real estate.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no inflated promises. Honest, data-backed guidance at every step.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Certified professionals with years of Dubai market experience.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Offices in Dubai and Istanbul, serving clients from over 40 countries.

client.title: Client First
client.description: Every decision guided by what's best for our clients' investment goals.

hero.subtitle: Bridging continents, connecting investors with the world's most dynamic property market through unmatched expertise and unwavering integrity.

offices.label: Global Presence
offices.title: Our Offices
offices.description: Strategically positioned at the crossroads of global investment, our offices are your gateway to Dubai's luxury property market.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.description: Connect with our team of experts and discover the perfect property for your lifestyle and investment goals.

meta.title: Golden Visa | EmlakBanq
meta.description: Learn about Dubai Golden Visa through real estate investment.

goldenVisa.heading: Your Gateway to UAE Residency Through Property Investment
goldenVisa.subtitle: UAE Golden Visa

hero.subtitle: The UAE Golden Visa programme offers long-term residency to property investors, providing a world-class lifestyle in one of the globe's most dynamic economies.
hero.intro: EmlakBanq provides end-to-end Golden Visa assistance -- from identifying qualifying properties to completing your visa application. Our dedicated team has helped hundreds of families secure their UAE residency with confidence.

benefits.label: Why Golden Visa?
benefits.title: Benefits of the UAE Golden Visa

renewable_residency.title: 10-Year Renewable Residency
renewable_residency.description: Secure long-term UAE residency for yourself and your family with a 10-year visa that is fully renewable.

family_sponsorship.title: Full Family Sponsorship
family_sponsorship.description: Sponsor your spouse, children, and domestic staff under a single visa application with no additional property requirements.

business_ownership.title: 100% Business Ownership
business_ownership.description: Establish and fully own a business in the UAE mainland or free zones without the need for a local sponsor.

ease_of_travel.title: Ease of Travel
ease_of_travel.description: Enter and exit the UAE freely without restrictions. Your visa remains valid regardless of time spent outside the country.

tax_free.title: Tax-Free Environment
tax_free.description: Enjoy zero personal income tax, zero capital gains tax, and one of the world's most business-friendly fiscal policies.

premium_services.title: Premium Services Access
premium_services.description: Gain access to world-class healthcare, education, and banking services reserved for UAE residents.

eligibility.label: Requirements
eligibility.title: Eligibility Criteria
eligibility.description: The following criteria apply to the property investor route of the UAE Golden Visa programme.
eligibility.item1: Purchase a property in the UAE with a minimum value of AED 2 million (approximately USD 545,000).
eligibility.item2: The property must be retained for at least 3 years from the date of visa issuance.
eligibility.item3: Property can be residential or commercial, off-plan or ready, and can be fully owned or shared ownership.
eligibility.item4: Mortgaged properties are eligible, provided the purchase value meets the minimum threshold.
eligibility.item5: Application must be submitted within 6 months of property registration with the Dubai Land Department.
eligibility.item6: No minimum salary requirement or employment status restrictions apply for the property investor route.

process.label: How It Works
process.title: Your Path to the Golden Visa

step1.title: Property Selection
step1.description: Choose a qualifying property worth AED 2M+ with guidance from our expert advisors.

step2.title: Purchase & Registration
step2.description: Complete the purchase and register the property with the Dubai Land Department.

step3.title: Document Preparation
step3.description: Gather required documents including passport copies, Emirates ID, and property deed.

step4.title: Visa Approval
step4.description: Submit your application and receive your 10-year Golden Visa within 30-60 days.

cta.title: Start Your Golden Visa Journey
cta.description: Our dedicated visa specialists will guide you from property selection to visa approval. Book a free consultation today.
